definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.chinese: 是名词子句当受词，也是补语。

sentences.english: VRC is a syntax structure consists of a verb and its resultative complement.
sentences.chinese: 动结式”是指动词带表示结果的补语组成的句法结构。

sentences.english: This dissertation aims to study the semantic orientation of the Chinese verb-resultative complement.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究汉语动结式补语的语义指向。

sentences.english: The extensional meaning of compound directional complement has its cognitive basis.
sentences.chinese: 复合趋向补语的引申意义有其认知上的理据。

sentences.english: Linking verbs are followed by a subject complement .
sentences.chinese: 连系动词之后须带主语补语。

sentences.english: The degree complement in Xianyang dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 咸阳方言中的程度补语很复杂。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 is focused on the semantic meaning of complement in verb-complement structure of Zhuang language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析了壮语述补结构中补语的语义。

sentences.english: Nouns, adjectives and infinitives can be used as objective complements.
sentences.chinese: 名词，形容词及不定式可用作补语。

sentences.english: The Chinese grammatical researchers generally think that there cannot be resultant complements after the reduplicated verbs.
sentences.chinese: 语法研究者普遍认为，动词重叠后面不能带结果补语。

sentences.english: At the same time, it summarizes the proir alignment of the trend verb as an adjective complement.
sentences.chinese: 同时还总结了趋向动词作形容词补语能力的优势序列。

sentences.english: Complement: the words on the right side of the heads are complement.
sentences.chinese: 出现在中心词的右边的词用作补语。

definition: subject-verb-object SVO or subject-predicate-object sentence pattern (e.g. in Chinese grammar)
